page.title: 02Life on Low Mown Meadows.
page.content: Low Mown Meadows is a quiet housing estate.There are five shops but two are vacant at the moment.One is a fish and chip shop, one is an off license and the other is a hair-dressers.If we want anything we have to go to the supermarket.There are a lot of houses in Low Mown Meadows,most are council houses.Some are terraced,some are semi-detatched and a few are bungalows.My house has a dining room, sitting room, kitchen, four bedrooms and a bathroom. There are few leisure facilities on our estate except for Hartside school which is also a Community centre.
